document.full_text: law enforcement officers are being killed at an alarming rate, attorney general eric holder said on tuesday, adding that options are being explored to address the violence including seeking new gun control laws.
document.title: law enforcement deaths rising quickly: ag eric holder
lines_and_colors: law enforcement officers are being killed at an alarming rate, attorney general eric holder said on tuesday, adding that options are being explored to address the violence including seeking new gun control laws.
